name: Interstellar War Machines for Galactic 2e
description:
A two-pack of Pillars for Galactic 2e by Riley Rethal!

The Pillars are inspired by the Confederacy of Independent Systems and other Prequel trilogy factors.

THE ETERNAL SCHISM

  • is the mistrust created by constant war in the galaxy. There's no good vs. evil anymore.
  • even after we win, we fight and feud with each other forever until war becomes routine and meaningless.
  • bureaucracy always goes too far and breaks apart
  • inspired by the CIS and Senate's complacency that led to it

THE MECHANISM 

  • is the growing technology of the universe. Droids are often thought of as pawns in the game, but they're vital to keeping the galaxy running.
  • and as science marches forward, more weapons and tools are incorporated into the war.
  • inspired by the droids, death star, and droid armies of the prequels

CREDITS:

This work is inspired by but not affiliated with Galactic 2E by Riley Rethal.

Above images acquired freely from pexels.com
